Title: Safe Travel
Summary: Check the weather, research and plan a safe route, tell others, hire a guide, pack the right gear, stay within your limits, and track time.

Title: Photograph Maps
Summary: Photograph maps along the trail for future reference.

Title: Dracula Sneeze
Summary: Sneeze into your sleeve to prevent spreading germs.

Title: Pour Snacks
Summary: Pour snacks from their packaging and don't put your hand inside to prevent spreading germs.

Title: Fast Lane
Summary: Wait in lines with a higher server-to-customer ratio for faster service.

Title: Food Packing
Summary: Frozen and cold, heavy items on the bottom and fragile items on the top, distribute weight, and group items by their intended storage location.

Title: Finger-dip Test
Summary: Dip a clean finger into soil by a knuckle and if it comes out clean then the soil is dry.

Title: 3-2-1 Backup Strategy
Summary: The primary copy and backup 1 are on separate local storage devices and backup 2 is off-site.

Title: Incremental Releases
Summary: Small incremental changes and releases reduce the likelihood and severity of bugs.

Title: Forcing Function
Summary: Embed constraints in designs to enforce positive behaviours and prevent mistakes.

Title: Winking In The Dark
Summary: Nobody knows your product exists without marketing.

Title: Top-down Writing
Summary: Structure information in a logical hierarchy with a main idea and linking ideas.

Title: Fidelity
Summary: How closely a prototype matches the final product: low (simple), medium (balanced), and high (realistic).
